imdb.plot outline: CODA is a comedy series based on a real life story of a family whose parents are Deaf. We follow the life and extreme adventures of a guy named Adam.With his two siblings, a younger sister Olivia and older brother Jason, they are CODA's, "Children of Deaf Adults". This is the story of their trials and tribulations the Benson family lives.
imdb.title: Coda
plot: C.O.D.A (Children of Deaf Adults) follows a dysfunctional family in the Los Angeles suburbs. Sheryl and Michael Benson deaf adults, face the trials and tribulations of parenthood as their three children are trying to find their own way.::Julie Kelleher

CODA is a comedy series based on a real life story of a family whose parents are Deaf. We follow the life and extreme adventures of a guy named Adam.With his two siblings, a younger sister Olivia and older brother Jason, they are CODA's, "Children of Deaf Adults". This is the story of their trials and tribulations the Benson family lives.::Julie Kelleher
